sentences.sContent: During those intervening years Bridget had married her husband Robert.
sentences.sCn: 在其间的那些年里，布里奇特与罗伯特结为夫妻。

phrases.pCn: 中介变量；中介变项；中介变数

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间) + ven(来) + ing → 来到中间的 → 介于中间的

trans.tranCn: 介于中间的， 发生于期间的
trans.tranOther: An intervening period of time is one that separates two events or points in time
